tp:treatment-sec.p: Mexico , Oaxaca , Candelaria Loxicha, Portillo del Rayo.
Pacific slope of the Sierra Madre del Sur, southern Oaxaca ( Fig. 15 ).
lacking concavities; central pronotal tubercle slightly more developed and projected anteriorly than lateral tubercles; posterior pronotal midline completely effaced.
